> [nickwa](#comment_63_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): You fucked up the moment you married. You gave her the gun to your head the moment you did. Women have all the power in the courts, and society will blame you.
Exactly. 

@ nananuja
If you don't know about MGTOW, I think it is time to familiarize yourself with it. Man in our society are treated almost like second class citizens. You can see this in the family court, where you are always going to get divorce raped (the woman takes the children, you are not allowed to see them and you pay child support, risking going to prison if you can't pay). It will not stop until men take charge and put women in their place.

Women are driven by emotion and have no accountability. I know what you are going through. But rather than keeping things as they are and risking hurting your wife (I believe she will accuse you of domestic violence no matter what) you have to finalize the divorce as fast as possible and with the least damage.

Don't let her put you in an early grave. As for the kids, I'm sorry, but the system is not in your favor. I can recommend 2 youtube MGTOW channels: Sandman and Turd Flinging Monkey. They opened my eyes in regards to the gynocentric society and women's hypergamy.

I wish you well and I advise you keep your distance from your wife and document (have proof of) any abusive behavior towards your children. Maybe you can keep your children after divorce. Chances are slim though. You will be surprised how many people are in a similar situation to yours.

> [nickwa](#comment_64_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): Exactly. Society does not care about men. It is why I dropped out of high school, and got my GED because of females sexually bullying me everyday. The teachers were in on it too. Honestly, fuck dating. Women have way too much power nowadays.

I assume you are not married, which is good for you. Look at how many complications a woman brings into your life.
The focus of MGTOW, or Man Going Their Own Way is to self actualize. Meaning you get to find what you are passionate about and allocate your time the way you see fit. MGTOW also means getting rid of female validation. You are a man because you have a purpose in your life and you do everything to fulfill it. 

As for dating, it's the worst that's its ever been. With "#MeToo" and all the false allegations that follow, you risk a lot just to be accused without proof. Women have way too much power nowadays because men gave it to them. We have too many cucks in our society who are so dependent on what women think about them that they don't realize that they are being used.

One rule I use when dealing with a female is to think in my mind that I'm talking to a male, therefore reducing the risk that I at getting too attracted by them and losing my rationality. For those of you who want to learn more about MGTOW, here is an introduction video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iVXdxaaRiAU
